title:
Le chameau et le serpent rentrent dans un bar : v\'erification
  quasi-automatique de code OCaml en logique de s\'eparation
abstract:
This paper presents a translation from Gospel-annotated OCaml programs into
Viper, an intermediate verification language featuring Separation Logic. The
practical goal is to extend Cameleer with a new back-end to prove
heap-dependent OCaml programs. The logical specification of such OCaml programs
is described using an extension of Gospel to support Separation Logic features,
which we describe in the paper.
